Constantin Xenakis (28 Disemba 1931 - 6 June 2020) bụ onye Gris na-ese ihe nke bi na France
Ọrụ ya na-agụnyekarị edemede ederede, ọkachasị mkpụrụedemede Hibru

akara na koodu nke ndụ kwa ụbọchị, akara okporo ụzọ, alchemy, zodiac, akara mgbakọ na mwepụ na nke kemịkal, ihe odide ndị Ijipt, mkpụrụedemede sitere na mkpụrụedemede Grik, Phoenician na mkpụrụ edemede Arabic.
A mụrụ Xenakis na Cairo, Egypt, na 28 Disemba 1931
N'afọ 1976, ya na onye na-ede egwu bụ Jean-Yves Bosseur rụkọtara ọrụ n'ọrụ Ornigrammes
E mere ya Chevalier de l'Ordre des Arts et des Lettres n'afọ 1986
N'afọ 1996, Institut de France nyere ya Prix Delmas, na aro nke French Academy of Fine Arts
E meghere Ụlọ Constantin Xenakis na etiti obodo Fameck na 1991
N'afọ 1998, e nyere ya "Award of Appreciation" na 24th Olympiad site na National Museum of Contemporary Art, Korea.
A na-arụ ọrụ ya na National Gallery nke Gris na Macedonian Museum of Contemporary Art.
Ọ nwụrụ na 6 June 2020, mgbe ọ dị afọ iri asatọ na asatọ
